links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (22,-136,192).
formula: Contribution by Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 09 2011: (Start)a(n) = (54*12^n + 2^n -40*8^n)/15.a(n) = 20*a(n-1) - 96*a(n-2) + 2^n.a(n) = 22*a(n-1) - 136*a(n-2) + 192*a(n-3), n>=3. (End)
prog: (MAGMA) [(54*12^n + 2^n -40*8^n)/15 : n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 09 2011(PARI) Vec(1/((1-2*x)*(1-8*x)*(1-12*x))+O(x^99)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
